name: The Longest Journey
description:
Play the first opus of "The Longest Journey" GOG version on Linux with ResidualVM.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Multilanguage: you will be able to select others languages for menus and subtitles during install between spanish, italian, french and german. Credits: Danixu86 (sp), LiefLayer (it), Legluondunet (fr and ge).
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.setup: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG

options.keep: I prefer to keep default install language for menus and subtitles

input_menu.description: Do you want to use another language for menus and subtitles:

content:
custom-name: The Longest Journey - GOG - ResidualVM
files:
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/The%20Longest%20Journey/clean.sh
- multi5:
    filename: tlj_4cd_gog_menus_sub_multi5.zip
    url: https://www.dropbox.com/s/h2mfqt8bw7xygt2/tlj_4cd_gog_menus_sub_multi5.zip?dl=1
- rvmengine: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/games/the-longest-journey/engines-stark.tar.xz
- setup: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
game:
  game_id: tlj
  path: $GAMEDIR/GOG Games/The Longest Journey/
  subtitles: true
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: --extract $setup --output-dir "$GAMEDIR/The Longest Journey"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/tmp
    file: multi5
- input_menu:
    description: 'Do you want to use another language for menus and subtitles:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - keep: I prefer to keep default install language for menus and subtitles
    - fr: French
    - it: Italian
    - sp: Spanish
    - ge: German
    preselect: keep
- chmodx: script
- execute:
    args: $INPUT_LANG
    file: script
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/GOG Games/The Longest Journey/engines
    file: rvmengine
residualvm:
  fullscreen: true
